At Wed, 09 Apr 2008 18:59:10 -0000,
"bernardsirius" <bernardsirius@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I'm trying to get the server started (using ubuntu server) and access
> it's web interface. Launching worked apparently (messages end with
> "Web UI listening on localhost:8080), but I can't connect to it from
> the outside (should be http://67.207.136.21:8080/admin/).
>
> What did I do wrong?

The web UI is listening on the localhost (127.0.0.1), not the external
interface (in your case, 67.207.136.21). You need to use the -b (bind)
option to bind to the 67.207.136.21 interface.

best,
Erik Hetzner

--Multipart_Wed_Apr__9_17:30:23_2008-1
